definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.chinese: 四月帶來報春花美美甜甜。

sentences.english: Eurasian primrose with yellow flowers clustered in a one - sided umbel .
sentences.chinese: 歐亞報春花，花黃色，叢生於單側的傘形花序。

sentences.english: The primroses should begin to seed themselves down the steep hillside .
sentences.chinese: 報春花應該開始沿着陡峭的山坡一路撒播種子了。

sentences.english: When I find a yoghurt_pot full of primroses by my bed.
sentences.chinese: 在看到我牀前插在酸奶罐裏的報春花時。

sentences.english: Although the Primula resources are abundant in China, few of them have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗首先考察了雲南西北部的報春花屬植物資源。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize and establish the extraction of total flavones in Primula sikkmensis Hook.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鍾花報春花總黃酮最佳提取工藝條件。

sentences.english: Eurasian primrose with yellow flowers clustered in a one-sided umbel.
sentences.chinese: 歐亞報春花，花黃色，叢生於單側。

sentences.english: They walked along the primrose bank chatting.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿著報春花盛開的河岸邊走邊聊。

sentences.english: Primulas collected from Szechuan in recent expeditions.
sentences.chinese: 近年在四川採集的報春花。

sentences.english: Treatment seed with GA could make seed germination time short.
sentences.chinese: GA處理能縮短報春花種子萌發時間。

sentences.english: Any of numerous hybrids of this species with other primroses.
sentences.chinese: 與其它報春花的任何雜交品種之一。

sentences.english: The primroses should begin to seed themselves down the steep hillside.
sentences.chinese: 報春花應該開始沿着陡峭的山坡一路撒播種子了。

definition: the warbler sings and the swallow dances/prosperity abounds (idiom)
evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
in large numbers/in force/lit. clouds bubbling up
(in the spring) nature takes on a new look (idiom)
